data.title: Lauren Lissner
data.meta_description: Professor Lauren Lissner heads the Public Health Epidemiology Unit and coordinates the EpiLife center. Research area: Epidemiology, obesity, nutrition, diet assessment methodology Thesis: Dietary correlates of human obesity: the role of fat intake.
